mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(school_number) FROM student_osaas so WHERE so.school_number = #{school_number}

SELECT
FROM student_osaas so -- LEFT JOIN school_class sc ON so.class_id = sc.class_id WHERE so.admin_id = #{adminId} AND so.state NOT IN (0)
SELECT so.admin_id FROM student_osaas so WHERE so.register_number = #{registerNumber}
